#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
long long fibo(long long a,long long b,long n){
	long long arr[n+1];
	arr[1]=a;arr[2]=b;
	for(long long  i=3;i<=n;i++) {
		arr[i]=arr[i-1]+arr[i-2];
	}
	return arr[n];
}
int main() {
	long long int t,a,b,n;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--) {
		scanf("%lld %lld %lld",&a,&b,&n);
		printf("%lld\n",fibo(a,b,n));
	}
	return 0;
}
